title: Related rates and a sphere part - a

content.description: At time t,t ≥0 , the volume of a sphere is increasing at a rate proportional to the reciprocal of its radius. At t =0 , the radius of the sphere is 1 and at t =15 , the radius is 2. (The volume V of a sphere with a radius r is V=4/3πr3 .)
content.question: Find the radius of the sphere as a function of t.

frqParts.text: Find the radius of the sphere as a function of t.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
